description:
Happy is an open-source framework that embeds Jython into Hadoop and allows users to write map/reduce programs as simple and powerful functional data-flows in Python.

In this session, I’ll explain how Happy works, its benefits, and show how Metaweb uses Happy for processing and analyzing semantic graphs with hundreds of millions of edges. I’ll be working with open data from Freebase and Wikipedia.
title: Analyzing Giant Graphs using Hadoop and Happy
